statements: DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE hotel_id = 1 AND room_number = 101
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE hotel_id = 1 AND room_number = 101 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE room_number = 202 AND energy_usage > 100;
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE room_id = 201 AND reading_datetime <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM reservations WHERE guest_name = 'John Doe';
